title: Call this 3-bedroom, 1-bath Bella Vista gem home!
description:
Call this 3-bedroom, 1-bath Bella Vista gem home! Blending vintage original details with a recent renovation and upgrades throughout, this home is on a quiet, postcard-perfect block that is just steps away from some of the city's best offerings. The first floor features two rooms that can be used interchangeably as either living or dining rooms depending on your preference, followed by a separate eat-in kitchen with enough space for a breakfast table. With Carrara marble floors and detailing, stainless steel appliances, a durable quartz countertop, and a decorative iron-lattice window, this kitchen is both spacious and well-appointed. Stairs lead up to the second floor where a roomy guest bedroom with its own closet, a renovated bathroom, and an extra open space that easily be used as an office, playroom, or den, with a convenient linen closet await. The large master bedroom with closet and a charming second guest bedroom top off the property on the third floor. Remote controlled ceiling fans and mid-century-style fixtures in the 3 bedrooms and living spaces add smart, efficient flare paired with contemporary hardware and original inlaid floors. Washer and dryer are provided in the unfinished basement, which also has plenty of room for storage. Four AC units are also provided for the renter's convenience. This residential family-friendly block is convenient to schools, as well as Whole Foods and Acme supermarkets, the 9th Street Market, and South Street. Saloon Restaurant and brunch favorite Fitzwater Cafe are right around the corner, as is John's Water Ice, Fiorella, Nomad Pizza, The Good King, Rally Coffee Shop, and so many more places to explore.

Enter into the 1st floor where hardwood floors, recessed lighting, and modern touches stretch the length of the entire space. There is a giant window at the front for natural light and the space flows nicely back past your dining area and into your galley style kitchen. Downstairs, you will find a large den area your 2nd & 3rd bedrooms and full bathroom. This large living space can serve well as a den, playroom, office, or home gym and the 2 bedrooms at the back are sizable with closet space.
